sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-navbar toggleable="lg" type="dark" variant="primary">
    <b-navbar-toggle target="navbarTogglerDemo03"></b-navbar-toggle>
    <b-navbar-brand href="/">Shop</b-navbar-brand>

    <b-collapse id="navbarTogglerDemo03" is-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav class="mr-auto">
        <b-nav-item v-if="isAdmin"><router-link to="/admin/item/new">상품 등록</router-link></b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item v-if="isAdmin"><router-link to="/admin/items">상품 관리</router-link></b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item v-if="isUser"><router-link to="/cart">장바구니</router-link></b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item v-if="isUser"><router-link to="/orders">구매이력</router-link></b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item v-if="!isLoggedIn"><router-link to="/members/login">로그인</router-link></b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item v-if="!isLoggedIn"><router-link to="/members/new">회원가입</router-link></b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item v-if="isLoggedIn" @click="logout">로그아웃</b-nav-item>
      </b-navbar-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto">
        <b-form @submit.prevent="search" class="form-inline my-2 my-lg-0">
          <b-input v-model="searchQuery" class="mr-sm-2" type="search" placeholder="검색" aria-label="검색"></b-input>
          <b-button type="submit" variant="outline-success" class="my-2 my-sm-0">검색</b-button>
        </b-form>
      </b-navbar-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav>
        <b-nav-item-dropdown right>
          <template #button-content>
            Language
          </template>
          <b-dropdown-item @click="setLang('en_US')">영어</b-dropdown-item>
          <b-dropdown-item @click="setLang('ko_KR')">한국어</b-dropdown-item>
        </b-nav-item-dropdown>
      </b-navbar-nav>
    </b-collapse>
  </b-navbar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      isLoggedIn: false,
      isAdmin: false,
      isUser: false,
      searchQuery: ''
    };
  },
  methods: {
    setLang(lang) {
      console.log(lang);
    },
    search() {
      // 검색 로직
    },
    logout() {
      // 로그아웃 로직
    }
  }
};
</script>
